channel.title: Invisible Item Set
channel.description:
I recently started using a 317 client with 621 items, and I've got an issue with the Dungeoneering ranged body set. All 11 of them make the character invisible when they are worn. They are equipped in the right slot, and they're identified in the server so they function like "fullBody"s. (Whether they we're identified as such or not didn't make a difference though...) I tried replacing their models with the same models I got from a 634 model dump, but that didn't seem to work either. (I used a different ID for the items using the 634 items to be sure I was loading them right)
Any suggestions?

item.title: Invisible Item Set
item.dc:creator: @revengr revengr
item.description:
@revengr wrote:

I recently started using a 317 client with 621 items, and I’ve got an issue with the Dungeoneering ranged body set.
All 11 of them make the character invisible when they are worn.
They are equipped in the right slot, and they’re identified in the server so they function like "fullBody"s.
(Whether they we’re identified as such or not didn’t make a difference though…)
I tried replacing their models with the same models I got from a 634 model dump, but that didn’t seem to work either.
(I used a different ID for the items using the 634 items to be sure I was loading them right)

Any suggestions?
